events.name: ReviewSubmitted
events.description: Captures the submission of a customer review.

events.name: ReviewFlaggedForModeration
events.description: Indicates a review that has been flagged for inappropriate content.

events.name: ReviewModerationCompleted
events.description: Indicates that a flagged review has been moderated.

events.name: ReviewRespondedTo
events.description: Captures when a response is made to a customer review.

commands.name: ProcessReview
commands.description: Captures the submission of a customer review.

commands.name: FlagReview
commands.description: Indicates a review that has been flagged for inappropriate content.

commands.name: CompleteModeration
commands.description: Indicates that a flagged review has been moderated.

commands.name: SubmitResponse
commands.description: Captures when a response is made to a customer review.

integrationPoints.name: FeedbackSystem
integrationPoints.description: Integration with an external feedback collection system.

integrationPoints.name: UserNotificationService
integrationPoints.description: Integration for notifying users of review status.
